name: The Underground Man 2
description:
THE WASTELAND HAS CLAIMED YOUR LIFE
The year is 2134. The sequel is set 18 years after the events of the first game. Over a century has passed since the great war that turned the world into ruins. You will take on the role of a strong woman fighting for the survival of her home. Challenge gruesome enemies and overcome many obstacles to uncover the secrets of this unfriendly world.

WHAT'S ON THE MENU?
A nice hand-crafted pixel art graphics.
A captivating story full of surprises.
An exquisite black humor and references to pop culture.
An exciting and diverse gameplay that keeps you hooked to the action.
An awesome soundtrack.
